home.firstLine: Hi, I am Juan David Cabana Trejos.
home.thirdLine: I am passionate about web development, especially frontend development, although I have knowledge in backend.

about.about: Frontend and backend web developer, I am a cheerful, friendly, altruistic person, I like teamwork, good fellowship, responsible, always willing and eager to learn new technologies and deepen the ones I already know. The technologies I handle are HTML, CSS, Javascript and its versions of ECMAScript (ES6+), Node.js and its package and dependency management system NPM, React.js, a bit of typescript, relational database basics with MySQL, Express.js, Passport.js, JSON Web Token (JWT), and I have mainly used Git and Github for version control, although I have some familiarity with Microsoft Azure. I have worked under agile development methodologies such as scrum and canva.
about.experience: I have worked in two companies, both are dedicated to the educational field, they develop products for schools to manage all their academic records, one is called Siempre.net, in this I worked full time, and I am currently working in freelance mode in EdSoft, which is making a new product, whose purpose is to replace the existing one. I'm in charge of the design, layout and development of the new EdSoft platform, whose frontend is mainly developed in React.js, and GraphQL is used for consumption.
about.education: In 2019, I graduated as the best high school graduate in the Adventist school of Cartagena, thanks to that I got a scholarship for a year at the Adventist University of Colombia (UNAC), where I am currently studying 8th semester of systems engineering. engineering. At the beginning of 2020 I met the web development and I went deeper and deeper into this world of web development, until I became passionate about it.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Presentation of who I am, I talk a little about my work experience and my skills, this is also a small demonstration of what I can do.

projects.title: Pokedex Frontend
projects.description: The front-end was made in React, because updates are often costly and time-consuming, but with React we decreased these problems, due to its easy maintenance and excellent reusability.

projects.title: Pokedex Backend
projects.description: The back-end was done in Node.js, with the Express.js framework, because thanks to the functionalities offered by Node.js we will have a high scalability, and we can add modules or new features in an easy way thanks to its default package manager (NPM). package manager (NPM).

projects.title: Layout Technical Test
projects.description: Layout with responsive design of the mockups received, in this case a simulation of a Coomudelsa page.

projects.title: Backend COSCO
projects.description: Backend of social network that communicates crop sellers with buyers, the idea of this was that anyone can sell their crops through this platform, without generating any waste.

projects.title: Backend Tecno-Crop
projects.description: Simple backend of social network that communicates waste sellers with buyers, the idea of this was that any person or company can sell their waste through this platform, so as not to generate so many greenhouse gases.

projects.title: Vitagest frontend
projects.description: Application for the administration of the company Vitarrico, this project was an integrative project of the university that I did in 5th semester, whose objective was to measure and strengthen our knowledge.

projects.title: Integrating proyect
projects.description: It was my first integrative project, I did it in 3rd semester, it is an application for teaching stacks and queues, made purely in CSS, HTML and JavaScript.

home.firstLine: Hola, soy Juan David Cabana Trejos.
home.thirdLine: Me apasiona el desarrollo web, en especial el desarrollo frontend, aunque tengo conocimientos en el backend.
home.fourthLine: Estudiante de ingeniería de sistemas, 8º semestre.

about.about: Desarrollador web frontend y backend, soy una persona alegre, amable, altruista, me gusta el trabajo en equipo, el buen compañerismo, responsable, siempre dispuesto y con ganas de aprender nuevas tecnologías y profundizar en las que ya conozco. Las tecnologías que manejo son HTML, CSS, Javascript y sus versiones de ECMAScript (ES6+), Node.js y su sistema de gestión de paquetes y dependencias NPM, React.js, un poco de typescript, fundamentos de bases de datos relacionales con MySQL, Express.js, Passport.js, JSON Web Token (JWT), y he utilizado principalmente Git y Github para el control de versiones, aunque tengo cierta familiaridad con Microsoft Azure. He trabajado bajo metodologías ágiles de desarrollo como scrum y canva.
about.experience: He trabajado en dos empresas, ambas se dedican al ámbito educativo, desarrollan productos para que los colegios gestionen todos sus expedientes académicos, una se llama Siempre.net, en esta trabajé a tiempo completo, y actualmente estoy trabajando en modo freelance en EdSoft, que está realizando un nuevo producto, cuya finalidad es sustituir al ya existente. Me encargo del diseño, maquetación y desarrollo de la nueva plataforma de EdSoft, cuyo frontend está desarrollado principalmente en React.js, y para el consumo se usa GraphQL.
about.education: En el 2019, me gradué como el mejor bachiller en el colegio Adventista de Cartagena, gracias a eso obtuve una beca por un año en la Universidad Adventista de Colombia (UNAC), donde actualmente estudio 8vo semestre de ingeniería en sistemas. ingeniería. A principios del 2020 conocí el desarrollo web y fui adentrándome cada vez más en este mundo del desarrollo web, hasta apasionarme por este.
